sentences.sContent: A sudden rise in oil prices could lead to a breakdown of the economy.
sentences.sCn: 油价暴涨会导致经济崩溃。

sentences.sContent: The breakdown of the negotiations was not unexpected.
sentences.sCn: 谈判的失败是预料之中的事。

sentences.sContent: ...It becomes a breakdown process where everything ends up accelerating until it's all gone...

synos.tran: 故障；崩溃；分解；分类；衰弱；跺脚曳步舞

phrases.pCn: 电破坏；电击穿；绝缘破坏
停工时间；击穿时间；破坏时期
绝缘破坏，电击穿；电网失电
破坏点；强度极限；击穿点
成本分析；成本明细表；成本数量预算

remMethod.val: 来自词组break down (倒塌； 中止； 垮掉)

trans.tranOther: a failure of a relationship, discussion or system
